spell.name: Thornskin (HB)
spell.text:
You touch a willing creature, and thorns grow from their body. Until the spell ends when a creature misses the target with a melee attack or hits with a natural attack, they take 1d4 piercing damage. The target's unarmed and natural attacks deal an additional 1d6 piercing damage.
Source: GM Toolkit - Fantastic Flora (Third Party)

spell.name: Create Vines (HB)
spell.text:
Choose a point within range, and a 30 ft. long and 5 ft. wide mat of vines extends from that point in a direction of your choosing. When grown over a gap, the vines count as a bridge. When the vines are grown up a wall, the surface can be climbed at a speed equal to your movement speed.
At higher-levels: When cast this spell using a 2nd level spell slot or higher, the length increases by 20 ft. and the width increases by 5 ft. for each slot level above 1st.
Source: GM Toolkit - Fantastic Flora (Third Party)

spell.name: Floral Barb-Shooter (HB)
spell.text:
A plant grows in an unoccupied space of your choice that you can see within range. The plant occupies that space and the flowers it grows contain sharp barbs that are expelled when prey gets too close. Any creature hostile to you that moves to a space within 20 feet of the Barb-Shooter must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw against your spell save DC. The creature takes 5 piercing damage on a failed save, or 2 piercing damage on a successful one. The plan wilts and vanishes when it has done a total of 40 damage.
Source: GM Toolkit - Fantastic Flora (Third Party)

spell.name: Tree Feller (HB)
spell.text:
A large tree suddenly grows and then falls, crushing and knocking down those in its path. Choose a point of origin within range. A 30 ft. line extends from that point in the direction of your choosing. Any creatures in that line must make a Dexterity saving throw against your spell save DC or take 5d8 bludgeoning damage and fall prone, taking half damage on a successful save.
At higher levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th or higher level, increase the length of the line by 10 ft., and the damage by 1d8 for each slot level above 3rd.
Source: GM Toolkit - Fantastic Flora (Third Party)
